sections.sceneryDesc: An unforgettable experience of stunning landscapes and elegant architecture in a tropical paradise.
sections.hikingDesc: Journey through our protected national park and be awed by its breathtaking scenery.
sections.activitiesDesc: From oceans to peaks, create unforgettable family memories with activities for all.
sections.culinaryDesc: Every meal is a journey—local ingredients meet global flair in a stunning setting.
sections.testimonialsDesc: Our Guests Tell the Story of Our Paradise.
sections.roomsDesc: Your sanctuary of comfort and style. Unwind in our spacious, modern rooms with breathtaking views.

scenery.welcomeDesc: Enjoy the best holiday in Semporna
scenery.pearlIslandDesc: The natural resort surrounded by pristine nature of ocean and island
scenery.elegantDiningDesc: Sophisticated dining hall with panoramic ocean views and mountains
scenery.diningHallCenterDesc: Enjoy watching sea turtles in the center hall while dining
scenery.walkwayPathDesc: Enjoying the sky and sea view while walking
scenery.divingCenterDesc: A short walk before going for diving center
scenery.waterCharletsDesc: Our spacious and comfortable water chalets
scenery.horizontalViewDesc: Endless joy while going for adventures
scenery.sunsetViewDesc: Time pass while enjoying the sunset
scenery.meditationSpaceDesc: Peaceful environment to comfort and regenerate your soul
scenery.beautifulSkyDesc: Surrounded nature that helps you relax
scenery.goldenHourDesc: Spectacular sunset viewing terrace with panoramic ocean vistas

hiking.boheyDulangDesc: 2 minutes journey from Pearl Island Resort
hiking.welcomeTrailDesc: Guided start point with trail information

culinary.seafoodSpaghettiDesc: Zesty spaghetti, tossed with mixed seafood
culinary.koreanWingsDesc: Crispy, sweet, and spicy Korean favorite
culinary.roastedDuckDesc: Tender, succulent duck with perfectly crisp skin
culinary.saltPepperCrabDesc: Wok-tossed, savory, and aromatic whole crab
culinary.saladPrawnsDesc: Juicy prawns tossed in creamy fruit sauce
culinary.bakedMusselsDesc: Plump mussels baked under melted cheese
culinary.roastedVegetablesDesc: Sweet and savory earthy garden mix
culinary.puddingDesc: Silky smooth, sweet, comforting classic dessert
culinary.cheeseTartDesc: Buttery crust with rich, molten cheese filling

testimonials.oceanPrinceText: Such a great place to be away from city busy life. I like how the resort is in between mountain and sea. The view is stunning especially during sunset.
testimonials.zhunemigyiyiText: The natural environment is stunning, with countless schools of fish and turtles lurking in the water. Snorkeling at the pier is also excellent, with abundant coral and fish.
testimonials.wechatUserText: The scenery is very beautiful. There are many fish, coral reefs and turtles for snorkeling.
testimonials.tk650156Text: The rooms are all the same type, with the same view and environment. The rooms are large and fully equipped.

contact.title: Booking Inquiry
contact.description: Get in touch with us for reservations about your dream vacation.
contact.successDesc: Please review and send the pre-filled message to complete your booking inquiry.
contact.errorTitle: Please fill in all required fields
contact.errorDate: Departure date must be after arrival date
contact.instructions: After clicking the button, your email client will open with a pre-filled message.
contact.instructionsTwo: Please review and click "Send" to complete your booking inquiry.
contact.specialPlaceholder: Any special requirements, dietary restrictions, or additional information...

footer.sandakanAddress: Ground Floor, Lot 38 & 39, Block C, Bandar Tyng, Mile 5, North Road, PPM 255 Elopura, 90000 Sandakan, Sabah, Malaysia.
footer.tawauAddress: 1st Floor, No. 484, Block P, Bandar Sabindo, P.O Box 61120, 91021 Tawau, Sabah, Malaysia.
footer.kkAddress: Block B, 1st Floor, Lot B-1-1, Plaza Tanjung Aru, Jalan Mat Salleh, Tanjung Aru, 88100 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Malaysia.
footer.tagline: Experience Pure, Unforgettable Tranquility. Immerse Yourself in the Untouched Island Beauty of Semporna.

sipadan.title: Sipadan Kapalai Dive Resort
sipadan.description: Experience paradise at our exclusive tropical resort. Pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and world-class amenities await you in this secluded island sanctuary.

pearl.title: Pearl Island Resort
pearl.description: Located beside Bohey Dulang National Park, this new luxury retreat offers unrivaled access to adventure. Hike for breathtaking panoramic views of the mountains, sea, and sky, then relax in your tropical Semporna haven.

sections.sceneryDesc: 在热带天堂中享受令人难忘的壮观景观和优雅建筑的体验。
sections.hikingDesc: 穿过我们受保护的国家公园，被其令人惊叹的景色所震撼。
sections.activitiesDesc: 从海洋到山峰，与家人创造难以忘怀的回忆，活动适合所有人。
sections.culinaryDesc: 每一顿饭都是一次旅程——当地食材与全球风味在壮观的环境中相遇。
sections.testimonialsDesc: 我们的客人讲述了我们天堂的故事。
sections.roomsDesc: 您舒适和风格的避难所。在我们宽敞、现代的房间中放松身心，享受壮观的景观。

scenery.welcomeDesc: 在仙本那享受最美好的假期
scenery.pearlIslandDesc: 自然度假村，被海洋和岛屿的原始自然环境包围
scenery.elegantDiningDesc: 精致的餐厅，享有全景海景和山景
scenery.diningHallCenterDesc: 在用餐时享受中心大厅观赏海龟的体验
scenery.walkwayPathDesc: 享受行走时的天空和海景
scenery.divingCenterDesc: 前往潜水中心前的短途步行
scenery.sunsetViewDesc: 享受日落时光流逝的美妙时刻
scenery.meditationSpaceDesc: 舒适安宁的环境，滋养和再生您的灵魂
scenery.beautifulSkyDesc: 周围自然环境帮助您放松
scenery.goldenHourDesc: 壮观的日落观景平台，享有全景海景

hiking.boheyDulangDesc: 从珍珠岛度假村出发2分钟路程
hiking.welcomeTrailDesc: 有导游的起点，提供步道信息
hiking.panoramicViewDesc: 令人惊艳的海洋和岛屿景致

culinary.seafoodSpaghettiDesc: 爽口的意大利面，拌有混合海鲜
culinary.koreanWingsDesc: 香脆、甜辣的韩式经典菜
culinary.saltPepperCrabDesc: 锅炒、咸香、香气扑鼻的整只螃蟹
culinary.saladPrawnsDesc: 鲜嫩虾仁拌奶油水果酱
culinary.bakedMusselsDesc: 饱满的贻贝在融化的芝士下烘烤
culinary.puddingDesc: 丝滑顺软、甜蜜舒适的经典甜点
culinary.miniCakeDesc: 小巧精致、美味的一口美食
culinary.cheeseTartDesc: 黄油酥皮配浓郁融化的芝士馅

testimonials.oceanPrinceText: 这是一个远离城市喧嚣的绝佳去处。我喜欢度假村位于山海之间的地理位置。景色非常迷人，尤其是日落时分。
testimonials.zhunemigyiyiText: 自然环境非常令人惊艳，水里有无数鱼群和海龟。在码头浮潜也非常棒，有丰富的珊瑚和鱼类。
testimonials.wechatUserText: 景色非常美丽。有很多鱼、珊瑚礁和海龟可以浮潜。
testimonials.tk650156Text: 房间类型相同，景观和环境相同。房间宽敞且设施齐全。
